unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather's messing with everyone! My kisan chacha in Punjab is saying his paddy yield is down thanks to unpredictable monsoons. Last year on 26/01/2023, it was much better. Even the scientists at IARI are worried. I remember Amma saying in '98 that the rains were on time. Hope this Kharif season starting 15/06/2024 is good, or else, prices will go up again before Diwali. Maybe a havan for good weather at 10:00 hrs is needed!
normalised: Oh friend, weather is messing with everyone! My farmer uncle in Punjab is saying his paddy yield is down thanks to unpredictable monsoons. Last year on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three, it was much better. Even the scientists at I I A R I are worried. I remember Amma saying in ninety eight that the rains were on time. Hope this Kharif season starting fifteenth june two thousand and twenty four is good, or else, prices will go up again before Diwali. Maybe a havan for good weather at ten zero zero hours is needed!
